description: First verse repeats 4 times instead of 3 times
title: The Darkest Nights

description:
I tried to add this as a new tab version, but it wouldn't let me.
I fixed a couple of wrong notes and transposed most of the long stretches to make it easier to play.  Plus it teaches players how to use their pinky more!!!
title: The Darkest Nights

description: More changes to volume and added palm muting.
title: The Darkest Nights
